text: Masatsugu Nagato (born 18 November 1948) is a Japanese businessman, the president and CEO of Japan Post Holdings since April 2016, when he succeeded Taizo Nishimuro, following his hospitalization, having previously been president and CEO of Japan Post Bank. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese chief executives Category:20th- century Japanese businesspeople Category:21st-century Japanese businesspeople Category:Hitotsubashi University alumni Category:The Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy alumni
title: Masatsugu Nagato
